title: FS/FT: T206 Tolstoi BVG 4 Merkle (Throwing).. PRICE REDUCTION, NEED TO SELL BY FRIDAY
author: wazoo

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T206 Tolstoi BVG 4 Merkle (Throwing).. PRICE REDUCTION, NEED TO SELL BY FRIDAY
posts.post_content:
Hello all. Up for sale is a beautiful T206 Fred Merkle (Throwing) graded a BVG 4. The card looks great, and even has a neat wet sheet transfer. The transfer is quite prominent and one can see it well in person. Part of the "Tolstoi" letters actually appear on the front of the card, as well as the back frame. The card is [STRIKE]$225[/STRIKE], [STRIKE]$210[/STRIKE], [STRIKE]$189[/STRIKE], NOW $169 or best offer, shipping included. I will also consider T206 trades. I'm looking for a Lajoie, Tinker, Walsh, Baker, or any other Hall of Famers/Southern Leaguers basically. Thank you all for looking and have a nice night.

Note: Unfortunately Beckett made a mistake on the label. It is labeled Sweet Caporal, but actually the back is Tolstoi.
Sweet card, Waz!  If I didn't already have one, we'd be dealing!  Good luck on the sale/trade
Thanks Mike! I really appreciate it :)! Happy hunting.

I'm always open to trades by the way. Shoot me an offer. 

Looking for hall of famers and southern leaguers
Much bigger price reduction! Please take a look!
Even bigger reduction! I need to sell it before this Friday please help me out here!
